ud4.7:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud4.7:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma sariputto bhagavato avidure nisinno hoti pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya appiccho santuttho pavivitto asamsattho araddhaviriyo adhicittamanuyutto.
ud4.7:2.1: Addasa kho bhagava ayasmantam sariputtam avidure nisinnam pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya appiccham santuttham pavivittam asamsattham araddhaviriyam adhicittamanuyuttam.
